scripts.be-processing-start: DB_POSTGIS_HOST='localhost' DB_STATS_HOST='http://localhost' node -r dotenv/config be-processing.js dotenv_config_path=../env/.env
scripts.be-processing-docker: DB_POSTGIS_HOST='db-postgis' DB_STATS_HOST='http://db-stats' DB_STATS_PORT=8086 node -r dotenv/config be-processing.js dotenv_config_path=.env
